mainEntity.name: Does the wildcard give points in Wordfeud?

acceptedAnswer.text: Normally the wildcard gives 0 points, but it can still be extremely powerful because it makes it possible to create words that hit bonus squares or create good crosswords.

mainEntity.name: Can a wildcard become any letter?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes – the wildcard can be used as any letter in the game.

mainEntity.name: How do I type a wildcard in Wordfeud Helper?
